widget['selectioncommand'] = command
        # Select first item if it exists
        if len(items) > 0:
            widget.selectitem(items[0])
        # Pack widget
        widget.pack(side = side, fill = fill, expand = expand)
        # Bind help
        self.bind(widget, help)
        # Record widget
        self.addWidget(category, text, widget)
        return widget
